version_description: Fixed errors with IPv4 networks
Fixed errors with IPv4 networks

New 'Dual Mode' added
Added a new gesture for camera zoom

New 'Dual Mode' added
Added a new gesture for camera zoom

- Dual-mode improvements - colored lines will show you the direction where your cells are moving (line color can be changed at the settings)
- two-fingers-zoom can be turned on/off at the settings

- two-fingers-zoom can be turned on/off at the settings

It's Black Friday! Update the game and recieve 20% cashback everytime you purchase the sticker sets!

- Big update for Battle Royale gamemode! Now the match winner can change the settings for the next round! FFA, megasplit, virus types, server physics, map size and more - all these are now under your control! All you have to do is to win the Battle Royale!
- As always, lots of bugfixes for crashes!

- Big update for Battle Royale gamemode! Now the match winner can change the settings for the next round! FFA, megasplit, virus types, server physics, map size and more - all these are now under your control! All you have to do is to win the Battle Royale!
- As always, lots of bugfixes for crashes!

New Level system is ready! Get experience points for every match you play! Now you will always know the level and skill of your opponents! Level system will be updated and enhanced over the time, so stay tuned for the upcoming updates!

New Level system is ready! Get experience points for every match you play! Now you will always know the level and skill of your opponents! Level system will be updated and enhanced over the time, so stay tuned for the upcoming updates!
Bugfixes
Bugfixes
bugfixes
bugfixes
Certificate renewed, minor interface fixes

*** Fixed red flickering of team bases ***
We have added new awesome team gamemode - Team Base Defend! All players split in 2 teams. Each team gets random member to become the Base! Your task is to destroy the Base of the opponent team! You can choose the team at the start of the match by typing !team1 or !team2 at the chat! Each player has only 1 life. Perfect gamemode for the team training and tournaments!

Big update for PvP mode and PvP lobby! Now you can invite to PvP any player located in the lobby! Now you can invite players to PvP right from the regular server! Just long-tap his name in the chat and select "Invite to PvP" option! More changes and improvements are on the way! Stay tuned!

An important update required for all users! We are getting ready for the upcoming release of Challenges on mobiles!
An important update required for all users! We are getting ready for the upcoming release of Challenges on mobiles!

- It is here finally! Now you can play Challenges! Complete 10 missions and recieve real pts! It's a real miracle! You have been asking for this for ages! Enjoy!


New features:
- now you can set custom font COLOR for:
a) player names on balls
b) player mass on balls
c) mass on the viruses
All 3 colors are independent
- now you can view current year statistics for each server

Bugfixes:
- fixed crashes in Server Info screen
- fixed crash when entering the ClanHouses with wrong password
- fixed inactive Preferences menu button while in-game

Team Base Defend gamemode now is even better! We have added awesome skins for team members, and special skins for Team Bases! Choosing your team is now easier with on-screen buttons!
In the meantime we have fixed few issues reported by you: login problems, wrong passwords and other smaill things. Petri Dish keeps getting better every day - with your help! Thank you! (Btw, new Challenges are on the way, stay tuned for next updates)

*** This version contains few bugfixes for some longtime annoying issues ***
a) fixed no scrolling at the server stats window and after closing this window
b) chat input line is now fits on screen all the time
c) fixed progress bar at the Bomb-Your-Enemy challenge at Level 3

New Challenges Level 3 are waiting for You! Come, play, win and get your reward!

*** This version contains few bugfixes for some longtime annoying issues ***
a) fixed no scrolling at the server stats window and after closing this window
b) chat input line is now fits on screen all the time
c) fixed progress bar at the Bomb-Your-Enemy challenge at Level 3

*** New Gamemode: OverLimit ***

In this gamemode you will get points only for the mass that will get by the cell with full mass (22500 points) - only what's above the limit. Feeders will help you to get the limit! Try to play this gamemode with your teammate! Imagine yourself the black hole!

*** New Gamemode: OverLimit ***

In this gamemode you will get points only for the mass that will get by the cell with full mass (22500 points) - only what's above the limit. Feeders will help you to get the limit! Try to play this gamemode with your teammate! Imagine yourself the black hole!

*** New game mode - Egg Hunt! ***

In this gamemode you have to plant the eggs (with the V button or the special on-screen button) and to protect them from enemy players! As long as your egg are alive, they give you profit! More eggs you have planted - more profit you get! Feed your eggs and they will give you even more profit! You can explode enemy eggs with the bombs! Can you become the Egg Master?

*** New game mode - Egg Hunt! ***

In this gamemode you have to plant the eggs (with the V button or the special on-screen button) and to protect them from enemy players! As long as your egg are alive, they give you profit! More eggs you have planted - more profit you get! Feed your eggs and they will give you even more profit! You can explode enemy eggs with the bombs! Can you become the Egg Master?

- EggHunt gamemode visual fixes
- CrazySplit gamemode main ball red circle now fixed

- EggHunt gamemode visual fixes
- CrazySplit gamemode main ball red circle now fixed

*** Welcome to the new and updated PvP-Arena! ***
- Now you can call for PvP any player in the lobby directly and call any player from any server right away from the PvP lobby!
- Now you can play PvP for real petricks! Call the opponent, make a stake, win the match and get his petrics immediately on your PvP balance!
- You can top up your PvP balance with your regular petrics (pts)! 1 pts = 1 pvp balance!
- In next updates we will add the option to convert your PvP balance to the regular petricks!
- Start earning pts right now!

*** Lots of bug fixes and interface improvements! For your smooth and fun experience! ***

*** Challenges Level 4 are on the way in the next updates! Stay tuned! ***

*** Welcome to the new and updated PvP-Arena! ***
- Now you can call for PvP any player in the lobby directly and call any player from any server right away from the PvP lobby!
- Now you can play PvP for real petricks! Call the opponent, make a stake, win the match and get his petrics immediately on your PvP balance!
- You can top up your PvP balance with your regular petrics (pts)! 1 pts = 1 pvp balance!
- In next updates we will add the option to convert your PvP balance to the regular petricks!
- Start earning pts right now!

*** Lots of bug fixes and interface improvements! For your smooth and fun experience! ***

*** Challenges Level 4 are on the way in the next updates! Stay tuned! ***

Our game keeps getting better and better!
- now you will spawn faster at the crowded server!
- you will never again spawn on a bomb!
- you will never again spawn inside other players!
- other player will never again spawn inside of you!
We have also improved and simplified the local ban system!
Stay tuned for the sweet upcoming updates!

You have asked for it - we have done it! Daily Quests & Rewards! Free petricks, experience, colored chat nicks! Play at special servers, get to the top at the right time and win! Every day! Now your skill will help you to get free coins and get some recognition! Enjoy!
(And by the way, we have more tasty things to come in the future...)

You have asked for it - we have done it! Daily Quests & Rewards! Free petricks, experience, colored chat nicks! Play at special servers, get to the top at the right time and win! Every day! Now your skill will help you to get free coins and get some recognition! Enjoy!
(And by the way, we have more tasty things to come in the future...)

You've loved New Year Special servers? We have a surprise for you! They will be available to you on weekends (from Friday till Monday) as new WeekEnd Special gamemode!
- Animated skins will finally work as expected (no more black squares)!
- Also we have fixed few bugs!
Enjoy the game, players!

Enjoy the game, players!

New possibilities for visual customization at PetriDish!
- You can now enable the gradient background for the servers!
- You can enable the coordinate grid to navigate easier while playing with your friends!

And the most important part - you can customize the colors of all these new settings!

Get this update, create your own unique visual styles and share them with your friends!

New possibilities for visual customization at PetriDish!
- You can now enable the gradient background for the servers!
- You can enable the coordinate grid to navigate easier while playing with your friends!

And the most important part - you can customize the colors of all these new settings!

Get this update, create your own unique visual styles and share them with your friends!
